'''2.2.3106''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.2.3105''' ([[wikipedia:MacOS|macOS]]), or '''2.2.3103''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]), is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on June 8, 2021.

== Changes ==
* In support of the [[Caves & Cliffs]] update, improved error messaging to help users ensure they are using the correct Java Runtime.
